reasoning: ML Model: Overall fraud score 0.0%, RF 26.2%, XGB 23.6% – all well below escalation thresholds.
Customer Profile: Repeat customer, no prior escalations or fraud incidents (escalate_count=0).
Field Consistency: Numeric amount matches expected range for typical Western Union orders; no amount mismatch detected.
Document Markers: Signature field present; issuer (Western Union) is reputable.
Training Patterns: Although 45% of fraud cases involve amount mismatches, we see no mismatch here.
Historical Cases: No similar past frauds for this customer or scenario.
actionable_recommendations: Verify the missing “Written Amount” and “Date” fields directly on the physical document.
Call Western Union’s verification line to confirm serial number 4783667589 is active and legitimate.
Compare the purchaser’s government‐issued ID signature to the money order signature.
ai_analysis.historical_comparison: No past cases with similar attributes (same serial, amount, issuer, and a clean customer history) have resulted in fraud.
